name: タップ De ぷる萌え！ くのいちつばめ
summary:
捕らわれの”くのいちつばめ”
抵抗する”つばめ”をあなたの指で従順させよ！
--
She refuses to surrender – use your finger to make her obey!
Ultra-high resolution

You’ve cornered the ninja, TSUBAME!
She refuses to surrender - use your finger to make her obey!

With one tap she trembles and she moans softly.
But if you miss, TSUBAME will...
You can also use your FUDE to make her do as you wish!

Extra stage included
Please mind the sound.
Android 2.2 or later.
Requires Adobe AIR.
info:
